landing.title: Đorđo Glogovac
landing.description: Full stack developer who specializes in TypeScript & Python

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: Hi, I'm Đorđo Glogovac, a junior developer with experience in building full-stack applications. I mainly work with React, TypeScript, SASS, and Python. I enjoy developing both backend and frontend features. I'm focused on improving my skills and contributing to practical, well-built projects.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my projects

projectsData.title: T2 Trials
projectsData.description: Website used for managing most popular Master Duel Yu-Gi-Oh! 3v3 League. Used by over 1000 players!

projectsData.title: My Portfolio
projectsData.description: My personal portfolio website that you are on now. It is also fully open source!

projectsData.title: Computer Store
projectsData.description: My first e-commerce project for imaginary computer store. Made as final project for course that I went to.

projectsData.title: Image Optimizer
projectsData.description: Free software project I'm currently working on for optimizing images.
